Class SimulatorConnection

java.lang.Object
SimulatorConnection
public class SimulatorConnection
extends java.lang.Object
Class encapsulating the network communication with one simulator from the masters side.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    SimulatorConnection​(java.net.Socket socket)
    Simulator connection constructor.

  • Constructor Details

    • SimulatorConnection

      public SimulatorConnection​(java.net.Socket socket) throws java.io.IOException
      Simulator connection constructor. Extracts input and output streams from the socket.
      Parameters:
      socket - socket connected to the simulator.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - in case of error with extracting the input/output streams.

  • Method Details

    • pingSimulator

      public boolean pingSimulator()
      Pings the simulator to find out if the simulator is still connected.
      Returns:
      true if simulator is connected, false if communication fails. (doesn't throw exception)

    • initSimulator

      public void initSimulator​(Position topLeft, Position size) throws SimulatorConnectionException
      Simulator connection constructor.
      Parameters:
      topLeft - top-left corner of connected simulators area.
      size - size of connected simulators area.
      Throws:
      SimulatorConnectionException - in case of error in communication between master and simulator.

    • addToWaitingPeople

      public void addToWaitingPeople​(WaitingPerson person)
      Adds a person to the list of waiting people
      Parameters:
      person - person to add to the list

    • resolveWaitingPeople

      public void resolveWaitingPeople() throws SimulatorConnectionException
      Sends all waiting people to the simulator and passes confirmations to the simulator of origin.
      Throws:
      SimulatorConnectionException - in case connection to the simulator is lost.

    • addToWaitingConfirmations

      public void addToWaitingConfirmations​(WaitingPersonConfirmation confirmation)
      Adds a confirmation to the list of waiting confirmations.
      Parameters:
      confirmation - confirmation to add to the list

    • resolveWaitingConfirmations

      public void resolveWaitingConfirmations() throws SimulatorConnectionException
      Sends all waiting confirmations to the simulator.
      Throws:
      SimulatorConnectionException - in case connection to the simulator is lost.

    • containsPosition

      public boolean containsPosition​(Position position)
      Returns true if given position lies in connected simulators area.
      Parameters:
      position - position to be in the are.
      Returns:
      true if position is in connected simulator's area, false otherwise.

    • listen

      public java.lang.String listen() throws SimulatorConnectionException
      Waits for confirmations and/or data from the simulator and returns it
      Returns:
      String - received string
      Throws:
      SimulatorConnectionException - in case connection to the simulator is lost.

    • sendSetUp

      public void sendSetUp​(Position topLeft, Position size) throws SimulatorConnectionException
      Sends initial simulator set-up command with the worlds dimensions and the simulators position in the world
      Parameters:
      topLeft - top-left corner of this simulators area
      size - size of this simulators area
      Throws:
      SimulatorConnectionException - in case connection to the simulator is lost.

    • sendPerson

      public void sendPerson​(Person person, Position targetPosition, SimulatorConnection origin) throws SimulatorConnectionException
      Sends a person to the simulator.
      Parameters:
      person - Person to send to the simulator.
      targetPosition - position to place the Person on.
      origin - Simulator connector to pass the confirmation to.
      Throws:
      SimulatorConnectionException - in case connection to the simulator is lost.

    • sendPersonConfirmation

      public void sendPersonConfirmation​(int personalNumber, boolean confirmation) throws SimulatorConnectionException
      Sends a confirmation to the simulator.
      Parameters:
      personalNumber - unique identifier of the referenced person.
      confirmation - true if person was accepted by target location, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SimulatorConnectionException - in case connection to the simulator is lost.

    • sendLocation

      public void sendLocation​(Location location) throws SimulatorConnectionException
      Sends a Location to the simulator.

      This method does not transfer the locations visitors, all locations must be passed empty and then persons can be passed to it one by one.

      Parameters:
      location - location to send.
      Throws:
      SimulatorConnectionException - in case connection to the simulator is lost.

    • sendMoveCommand

      public void sendMoveCommand​(Master master) throws SimulatorConnectionException
      Sends a command to the simulator, that makes the simulator move people in it's area.
      Parameters:
      master - master instance to handle people transfers between simulators.
      Throws:
      SimulatorConnectionException - in case connection to the simulator is lost.

    • sendCalculateHealthCommand

      public void sendCalculateHealthCommand() throws SimulatorConnectionException
      Sends a command to the simulator, that makes the simulator calculate infection propagation.
      Throws:
      SimulatorConnectionException - in case connection to the simulator is lost.

    • sendContagionParameters

      public void sendContagionParameters​(ContagionParameters contagionParameters) throws SimulatorConnectionException
      Sends new updated values of contagion parameters to the simulator
      Parameters:
      contagionParameters - new contagion parameters
      Throws:
      SimulatorConnectionException - in case connection to the simulator is lost.

    • sendSendExtractCommand

      public void sendSendExtractCommand​(Position topLeft, Position size, Extract extract) throws SimulatorConnectionException
      Sends a command to the simulator to send back detailed information about locations in a certain area.

      This information is used to draw that area in output GUI window.

      Parameters:
      topLeft - topLeft corner of the displayed area.
      size - size of the displayed area.
      extract - extract to fill with received data
      Throws:
      SimulatorConnectionException - in case connection to the simulator is lost.

    • sendExitSim

      public void sendExitSim()
      Sends a command to the simulators that ends the simulator application.

    • sendSendStatsCommand

      public void sendSendStatsCommand​(Master master) throws SimulatorConnectionException
      Sends a command to the simulator to send back general information about number of different health statuses in it's area.

      This information is used to run the basic overall statistics in GUI window.

      Parameters:
      master - master to update the stats in.
      Throws:
      SimulatorConnectionException - in case connection to the simulator is lost.
